Package textEditor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    The Command interface was present ever since version 1.
    IEditorEngine
    IEditorEngine.
    IHistory
    IHistory.
    Observer
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 2.
    UserInterface
    An interface present in the implementation ever since version 2.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Buffer
    The Buffer class holds the text that is shown to the MiniTextEditor users.
    Clipboard
    The Clipboard class holds the text that is Cut/Copied by the MiniTextEditor users.
    CmdLine
    Simple class to ensure a command line feature of the editor.
    Constants
    This class was enriched with key strings present in the text editor throughout all three versions.
    ContextualMenuListener
    Contextual menu for the Cut/Copy/Paste A class present in the implementation ever since version 1.
    Copy
    The execution of the Copy Command A class present ever since version 1.
    Cut
    The execution of the Cut Command A class present ever since version 1.
    EditorEngine
    A class present in the Mini-Text Editor implementation ever since version 1.
    EditorKeyListener
    KeyListener for the text area in the GUI A class present in the implementation ever since version 1.
    EditorMouseAdapter
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 1.
    EnterText
    The execution of the EnterText command.
    Gui
    A class present throughout the implementation of all three versions.
    History
    Class added in version 2 and refactored especially to meet V3's needs.
    LoggerSingleton
    LoggerSingleton.
    Main
    The Main class.
    MakeSelection
    Execution of a MakeSelection command.
    Pair<T>
    A pair class used mostly to pass a binomial parameter to the setSelection method.
    Paste
    The execution of a Paste command.
    Recording
    The recording observes the changes occurred in the history engine and replays a list of commands according to the user's desires.
    SearchButtonActionListener  
    SearchWindow
    A frame in which you introduce the string you wish to search for in the given text.
    Selection
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 1.
    Subject
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 2.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExceedLengthException
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 1.
    NegativeStartException
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 1.
    WrongSelectionEndException
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 1.
    WrongSelectionStartException
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 1.
